data.name: api_feature_tariffs
data.marketing: Functionality that allows listing and modification of tariffs through the API
data.description: Functionality that allows listing and modification of tariffs through the API. It is important to note that this functionality will ONLY modify tariffs if the property is configured to use the Micromanage tariff editing mode.
data.change_log: v0.2 French language file added v1.0 API plugins updated to work with updates to Jomres, and some tweaks for consistency.
